mapper.select: SELECT A.POSITION_NAME, A.APPLICAITON_STATUS, e.EMPLOYER_NAME FROM (SELECT p.POSITION_NAME, p.EMPLOYER_ID, a.APPLICAITON_STATUS FROM POSITION p LEFT JOIN APPLICATION a on (p.POSITION_ID = a.POSITION_ID AND a.USERNAME = #{userName})) A, EMPLOYER e WHERE A.EMPLOYER_ID = e.EMPLOYER_ID

select p.POSITION_id,p.position_name,p.position_group_id,g.position_group_name,p.update_time, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.APPLICATION_STATUS=1 and a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as unreadapp_num, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as allapp_num from POSITION p, position_group g where p.position_group_id = g.position_group_id ORDER by p.UPDATE_TIME desc

SELECT POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, p.position_group_id,g.position_group_name,POSITION_DESCRIPTION, RESPONSIBILITIES, REQUIREMENTS, SALARY FROM POSITION p, position_group g WHERE POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and p.position_group_id = g.position_group_id
